newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 23.
newsitem.headline: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 23.

text.p: These were the main news headlines reported by Lithuania's radio M1 Plus at noon on Friday. Reuters has not verified these reports and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Lithuanian and Latvian delegations continue sea boarder talks in Riga. The negotiations hit a wall when the two neigbouring countries failed to reach an agreement over the oil well in the disputed territory in the Baltic Sea.
- The Appeal court is hearing today a case of the leader of Kaunas criminal world Henrikas Daktaras who was sentenced in February for seven and a half years of imrisonment.
